text: Futhi (izitha zikaMvelinqangi) ziyothi ezikhumbeni zazo, “kungani nifakaza ngathi na? izindlebe zazo namehlo azo kanye nezikhumba zazo ziyothi, “nguMvelinqangi osenze ukuthi sikhulume lowo okunguyena owenza zonke izinto ukuthi zikhulume futhi yena wanidala ekuqaleni futhi niyobuyiselwa kuyena
